title: Magnetism - Change in flux after rotation

content.description: Which of the following correctly compares the magnitude and sign of the magnetic flux after the loop has been rotated to those of the original flux?
content.question: Magnitude of flux Sign of flux A The same The same B The same Opposite sign C Less The same D Less Opposite sign

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
